title: Mission Statement:  To provide PTHSD high school students with the opportunity to  concentrate their studies, beyond those required in high school, in the areas of science,  technology, engineering, and mathematics, and expose students to relevant real world  experiences through project work, conferences and presentations to enhance their high school  experience.  Goals:

outline.text: •  Inspire keen interest in mathematics, science, engineering, and technology, develop strong scholarship in the subject and  promote the enjoyment of these studies in high school.
